item.name: F19 to Escape and Control
item.appendix: Tap F19 for Escape, Hold F19 for Control
Works well with using PCKeyboardHack to remap CapsLock to F19(code 80).

item.name: Change Command+Q to Command+Shift+W
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::Q, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_COMMAND | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::Q, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_COMMAND | ModifierFlag::NONE
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::Q, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_COMMAND | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::W, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_COMMAND | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L

item.name: Hold Command+Q to Quit Application
item.appendix: (You can adjust the threshold time of holding by
"Holding Key to Key > Holding Threshold" in Key Repeat tab.)
item.autogen: __HoldingKeyToKey__ KeyCode::Q, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_COMMAND | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::Q, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_COMMAND, Option::NOREPEAT

item.name: Press Command+Q twice to Quit Application
item.autogen: __DoublePressModifier__ KeyCode::Q, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_COMMAND | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::Q, MODIFIERFLAG_EITHER_LEFT_OR_RIGHT_COMMAND

item.name: Change "right option key + equal key" to "move focus to next window in application".
item.appendix: (You need to enable command-backquote (⌘`) shortcut from System Preferences.)

item.name: Change "right option key + bracket keys" to "move focus to previous/next tab in application".
item.appendix: (Change right option key + bracket keys to command-{})

item.name: Switch current setting profile by fn+1,fn+2,fn+3, and fn+4.
item.appendix: (You can make multiple profiles by MenuBar tab on Preferences.
This setting changes current profile by shortcut.)
